Warehouse_A.description: Maximum units that can be shipped from Warehouse A

Warehouse_B.description: Maximum units that can be shipped from Warehouse B

Customer_1.description: Minimum units that must be delivered to Customer 1

Customer_2.description: Minimum units that must be delivered to Customer 2

constraint_types.capacity_constraint: Sum of shipments from each warehouse <= warehouse capacity
constraint_types.demand_constraint: Sum of shipments to each customer >= customer demand
